buildCommand: cd .. && npm install --prefix restaurant-system && npm run build --prefix restaurant-system && npm install --prefix restaurant-system/admin-panel && npm run build --prefix restaurant-system/admin-panel && npm install --prefix restaurant-system/customer-menu && npm run build --prefix restaurant-system/customer-menu && npm install --prefix restaurant-system/cashier-terminal && npm run build --prefix restaurant-system/cashier-terminal && npm install --prefix restaurant-system/kitchen-display && npm run build --prefix restaurant-system/kitchen-display
